subSections.title: Glyph origin
Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{zh-forms|alt=萅,旾}}
Related to {{och-l|芚|(of plants) to begin to grow}} ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}). Also compare {{cog|km|ដុះ||to grow; to germinate; to sprout}}, as well as {{och-l|穿|to bore through}} ([[ibid.]]).
